rule.description: Potential file system race condition
rule.name: js/file-system-race
rule.full_description: Separately checking the state of a file before operating on it may allow an attacker to modify the file between the two operations.

message.text: The file may have changed since it was checked.

rule.description: Missing origin verification in `postMessage` handler
rule.name: js/missing-origin-check
rule.full_description: Missing origin verification in a `postMessage` handler allows any windows to send arbitrary data to the handler.

message.text: Postmessage handler has no origin check.

rule.description: Missing origin verification in `postMessage` handler
rule.name: js/missing-origin-check
rule.full_description: Missing origin verification in a `postMessage` handler allows any windows to send arbitrary data to the handler.

message.text: Postmessage handler has no origin check.

rule.description: Disallow `@ts-<directive>` comments or require descriptions after directives

message.text: Do not use "@ts-ignore" because it alters compilation errors.
